Citation_Information.description: The raw data collection contains the raw science and housekeeping data from the instrument and the data is released publicly on a daily basis with a six month lag from the data being obtained. Physically the collection is organised by science phase, then orbit range in groups of 100 orbits, then orbit.Different data types e.g. HK plus science from different channels may be mixed in this time related directory. A description of the raw data products is given in the ACS Experiment to Archive InterfaceControl Document (EAICD), available under the Documents tab in the PSA user interface or via the DocumentCollection on the PSA ftp page (http://archives.esac.esa.int/psa/ftp/ExoMars2016/em16_tgo_acs/document). A quick start guide can also be found at: https://issues.cosmos.esa.int/socciwiki/display/PSAPUB1/ACS+Quick+Start+Guide

Modification_Detail.description: From June 2024 and DPS version 5.0 all products produced are version 4.0 and information model v1.21. This includes both reprocessed products from before this date and newly generated products processed for the first time, hence for data generated by the TGO after this date, the first version will be version 4.0.

Table_Character.name: Frame1
Table_Character.description: Data frame header that precedes that data frame rows

Field_Character.name: INSTRUMENT
Field_Character.description: Channel identifier

Field_Character.name: FRAME
Field_Character.description: Channel-specific continuous number of a data record

Field_Character.name: OBT
Field_Character.description: Onboard time in 2^−24 s

Field_Character.name: PACKET_NUMBER
Field_Character.description: Continuous number of a channel observation data record

Field_Character.name: LABEL
Field_Character.description: The packet identifier

Field_Character.name: LOCAL_TIME
Field_Character.description: Local time of the frame registration start in 0.01 s

Field_Character.name: FRAME_INDEX_RANGE
Field_Character.description: The spectre allotment offset in the SPECTRAL_RANGE list of the AA table

Field_Character.name: FRAME_INDEX_SERIES
Field_Character.description: The measurement series serial number

Field_Character.name: CONFIGURATION_ADD
Field_Character.description: Rows in the detector bars summation flag

Field_Character.name: CONFIGURATION_SCALE
Field_Character.description: Scaling flag

Field_Character.name: CONFIGURATION_COMPRESS
Field_Character.description: Compression flag

Field_Character.name: CONFIGURATION_DIFFERENCE
Field_Character.description: Background from signal subtraction flag

Field_Character.name: CONFIGURATION_DARK
Field_Character.description: Background signal transmission flag

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_SEGMENT
Field_Character.description: 2^(4+Value) points in compressed segment

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_TRUNCATE
Field_Character.description: Amount of bits by which output data were unshifted

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_CUT
Field_Character.description: Amount of the segments trimmed totally of the spectral range edges

Field_Character.name: DETECTOR_GAIN
Field_Character.description: Flag of the detector amplifier activity

Field_Character.name: DETECTOR_EXPOSITION
Field_Character.description: The total integration time from 63 us in 64 us

Field_Character.name: DET_TEMPERATURE
Field_Character.description: The detector temperature in 0.01 K

Field_Character.name: ACCUMULATION
Field_Character.description: (max(8 Value,1)) detected frames summed-up into the data frame

Field_Character.name: AOM_FREQUENCY
Field_Character.description: The AOTF frequency from 64 MHz in 50 KHz

Field_Character.name: AOM_TEMPERATURE
Field_Character.description: The AOTF temperature in 0.1 K

Field_Character.name: STATUS
Field_Character.description: Record status

Field_Character.name: CRC
Field_Character.description: CRC-16 CCITT of the previous 2046 bytes

Field_Character.description: The packet identifier

Field_Character.name: COMMAND_SINGLE
Field_Character.description: Non-cyclic measurements flag

Field_Character.name: COMMAND_PACK
Field_Character.description: Flag of data accumulation and transmission in packets

Field_Character.name: COMMAND_MODE
Field_Character.description: Not-test mode flag

Field_Character.name: CONFIGURATION_ADD
Field_Character.description: Rows in the detector bars summation flag

Field_Character.name: CONFIGURATION_SCALE
Field_Character.description: Scaling flag

Field_Character.name: CONFIGURATION_COMPRESS
Field_Character.description: Compression flag

Field_Character.name: CONFIGURATION_DIFFERENCE
Field_Character.description: Background from signal subtraction flag

Field_Character.description: Background signal transmission flag

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_SEGMENT
Field_Character.description: 2^(4+Value) points in compressed segment

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_TRUNCATE
Field_Character.description: Amount of bits by which output data were unshifted

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_CUT
Field_Character.description: Amount of the segments trimmed totally of the spectral range edges

Field_Character.name: DELAY
Field_Character.description: Delay in 5 s between the measurement and data transmission starts

Field_Character.name: INTERVAL
Field_Character.description: The interval in 1/2 s between measurements series

Field_Character.name: TIME
Field_Character.description: The measurements time span from the data transmission start

Field_Character.name: DETECTOR_GAIN
Field_Character.description: Detector amplifier on: 1 stands for the enabled detector amplifier and 0 does for the disabled one

Field_Character.name: DETECTOR_EXPOSITION
Field_Character.description: The total integration time with 64 us stepping

Field_Character.name: DETECTOR_TEMPERATURE
Field_Character.description: Target temperature with 2.56 K stepping

Field_Character.name: SUBSTRATE
Field_Character.description: Substrate voltage with 3.3/4096 V stepping

Field_Character.name: REFERENCE
Field_Character.description: Reference voltage with 3.3/4096 V stepping

Field_Character.name: OFFSET
Field_Character.description: Offset current

Field_Character.name: AOM_DISABLED
Field_Character.description: AOM off: 1 stands for the disabled AOM and 0 does for the enabled one

Field_Character.name: AOM_POWER
Field_Character.description: AOM power attenuation

Field_Character.name: FRAME_BAR_1_BEGIN
Field_Character.description: The first row index from 0 to 510 in 2 rows of the first bar, stripped from frame

Field_Character.name: FRAME_BAR_1_END
Field_Character.description: The last row index from 1 to 511 in 2 rows of the first bar, stripped from frame (zero last row index exceptionally stands for not stripping the bar at all)

Field_Character.name: FRAME_BAR_2_BEGIN
Field_Character.description: The first row index from 0 to 510 in 2 rows of the second bar, stripped from frame

Field_Character.name: FRAME_BAR_2_END
Field_Character.description: The last row index from 1 to 511 in 2 rows of the second bar, stripped from frame (zero last row index exceptionally stands for not stripping the bar at all)

Field_Character.name: FRAME_BAR_3_BEGIN
Field_Character.description: The first row index from 0 to 510 in 2 rows of the third bar, stripped from frame

Field_Character.name: FRAME_BAR_3_END
Field_Character.description: The last row index from 1 to 511 in 2 rows of the third bar, stripped from frame (zero last row index exceptionally stands for not stripping the bar at all)

Field_Character.name: FRAME_BAR_4_BEGIN
Field_Character.description: The first row index from 0 to 510 in 2 rows of the fourth bar, stripped from frame

Field_Character.name: FRAME_BAR_4_END
Field_Character.description: The last row index from 1 to 511 in 2 rows of the fourth bar, stripped from frame (zero last row index exceptionally stands for not stripping the bar at all)

Field_Character.name: FRAME_BAR_5_BEGIN
Field_Character.description: The first row index from 0 to 510 in 2 rows of the fifth bar, stripped from frame

Field_Character.name: FRAME_BAR_5_END

Field_Character.name: RESERVED
Field_Character.description: Unused bytes

Field_Character.description: Exclusive disjunction of the previous 57 bytes
